title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 74 - Social Work
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 74 - Social Work

State Regulations
§ 74.1 - Professional study of social work
§ 74.2 - Professional licensing examinations
§ 74.3 - Experience requirement for licensure as a licensed clinical social worker
§ 74.4 - Limited permits
§ 74.5 - Authorization qualifying licensed clinical social workers for certain insurance reimbursement (Repealed)
§ 74.6 - Supervision requirements for certain qualified individuals providing clinical social work services
§ 74.7 - Supervision of certain social workers providing licensed master social work services
§ 74.8 - Special provisions
§ 74.9 - Licensure by endorsement of certain licensed clinical social workers
§ 74.10 - Continuing education for licensed master social workers or licensed clinical social workers

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 74

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§207, 210, 212, 6501, 6504, 6506, 6507, 6508, 7701, 7703, 7704, 7705, 7706, 7707; Insurance Law, §§3221, 4303

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
